description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Planetary Shield is a game of skill in which you have to destroy all the meteorites before they impact on Earth, and yet manage to cover and drive rescue ships fleeing from Earth. Your armament is a ball of energy generated between two satellites. You can also get items that give you the advantages needed for the most difficult moments.
